choose:  
A. I fly forward and then rise.  
B. I turn left and fly forward.  
C. I fly forward while descending.  
D. I turn right and go up.  
E. I rotate the camera downward.

Therefore, flying forward while descending aligns with the next steps in the navigation instruction.
